title: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing the ShiftLeft function with intermixed tabs and spaces, the behavior is not as expected.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the ShiftLeft function is executed, the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left at least to the space character, removing the tab. This behavior should be consistent irrespective of the presence of a stray space.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Replace the tab character in the first line with spaces so that the two lines are indented the same visually.
2. Execute the ShiftLeft function.
3. Observe how the text moves.
